title: How would you describe your morning routine? - Quora

response.answer_text: Usually I'm going to bed about then and get up sometime in the afternoon so that's when I have breakfast sometimes sometimes I sleep later and then I have dinner it just depends. Since I'm not married anymore I'm 82 and no children are all my close relatives are dead I'm what you call The Last of the Mohicans that's fine I grew up alone no Brothers No Sisters but I have so many things going on in my life on my own property I don't have time to think about being alone plus I have a great collection of music that I've been working on for the last 50-60 years and a great sound system so I'm I'm pretty happy camper can I use a smartphone that's how I do a lot of research learn about history cuz I'm a real fanatic Hunter history but my actual profession I graduated in 61 with a degree in industrial Arts so professionally I'm a shop teacher which allows me to to know an awful lot about how to do stuff and fools I have a huge collection of woodworking tools that's my favorite hobby also where I need my living most of my life that's why I have two shops on my property have a general shop which I had built in 2000 for 20,000 that included the interest in everything then I wanted another shop for strictly woodworking so I built that when I was 79 out of mostly used material the only thing I bought was the sheet metal roofing and the plywood for the siding and if you electrically items most of what I had.I do a lot of work on my house both inside and outside I refinish furniture I build Furniture I design stuff for people and then build it. I'm enjoying my life probably more so than ever in my lifetime except when I was doing theater. I did 27 years of Community Theater as I loved to sing. I did a lot of musicals 14 to be exact. I also built and design sets so I did backstage work as well as on the boards it was a lot of fun

Wake up between 4–5 am depending on day. I sit quietly for about 30 mins and practice gratitude. I sit for another 30 mins and express gratitude, usually on social media just to throw that energy out there. I check emails, wish friends and family happy birthday. Start choosing what I’m going to wear or what will be for breakfast. I start taking out my supplements clean up a little my room. Then I head off to shower and brush teeth. Then I make breakfast, eat take supplements, dress and I head out.
